name: Berbere Dip
description: A very spicy dip for dipping into with crudités or crackers! Let it sit for an extra kick of heat, or dial it down by adjusting the seasoning for a milder experience. For a creamy, rich twist, blend in some sour cream.
preparation: In a bowl, whisk together yogurt and seasoning. If you have time, let stand 10 min before serving. This allows time for the seasoning to hydrate and flavours to blend.

products.name: Berbere Seasoning
summary: Spice up your summer season with this rich, complex, and spicy seasoning, pronounced “bear-ber-ay.” This is a HOT one! Central to Ethiopian and Eritrean cuisine, it delivers a kick that’s bursting with flavor!
